title: Ambient Video Game Music - Desert Oasis 2
description: Introducing our sequel collection of 10 atmospheric soundtracks, meticulously crafted for the unique needs of game developers.
longDescription:
Introducing our sequel collection of 10 atmospheric soundtracks, meticulously crafted for the unique needs of game developers. This collection vividly captures the captivating aura of a desert oasis, inviting players to delve into the immersive world you've crafted with unparalleled depth and realism.


Immerse your gaming audience in the desolate beauty of desert landscapes punctuated by life-giving oases. Our tracks echo the unique symphony of the desert, from the gentle sound of precious water burbling through the arid wilderness to the sporadic, melodic chirping of hardy desert birds.


Each track is designed to engage your players emotionally, intensifying the gaming experience. The soothing murmur of water creates an atmosphere of serenity amidst the relentless desert heat, while the intermittent bird calls add layers of depth to the environment. The tracks effortlessly blend with gameplay, providing an underlying score that heightens the sense of being in a living, breathing ecosystem.


Designed with adaptability in mind, these soundtracks can seamlessly complement a variety of game scenarios, from tranquil exploration sequences to suspense-filled, heart-racing moments. The intricate blend of sounds can be easily manipulated to suit different gameplay elements, enhancing the dynamism and fluidity of your game narrative.


Whether used as a background score or to highlight key moments in your game's storyline, this collection offers a comprehensive palette of auditory experiences. It serves not just as an accompaniment to your game's visual artistry but also as a vital tool in crafting immersive gameplay experiences.


Harness the evocative power of our ambient soundtracks and transport your players straight into the heart of the sun-kissed desert, enhancing their in-game journey with a sensory experience they won't soon forget.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--

Music Preview 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SSvg27CGpIs

Music Preview 3: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_dNK3JCaTgU


--


Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
technicalDetails:

Do Sound FX loop: (No)

Number of tracks: 10

Number of cues: 10

Minutes of audio provided: 30 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)
